meanings.definition: A person who finds fault with small, unimportant details.
meanings.sent1: Some nitpickers always notice tiny mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The nitpickers in the group pointed out every flaw.
meanings.sent3: The nitpickers at the party couldn't help but spot the crooked picture frames.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like nitpickers, catching every imperfection in the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The nitpickers' sharp eyes uncovered the hidden errors.

meanings.definition: Those who are overly critical or meticulous in their observations.
meanings.sent1: The nitpickers in the office never missed a single error.
meanings.sent2: My friends are such nitpickers when it comes to grammar.
meanings.sent3: The nitpickers at the movie theater whispered about the actors' mistakes.
meanings.sent4: His brain worked like a team of nitpickers, analyzing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The nitpickers' attention to detail was unmatched in the group.
